Feature: Are there specific vocabularies for hunting or use in the presence of avoidance kin?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Ada kata-kata yg khususnya dipakai dalam rangka perburuan atau perikanan? Ada kata-kata yg dilarang dipakai dalam rangka itu?
db_Object: Are there specific vocabularies for hunting or use in the presence of avoidance kin?

Feature: Is there ritual speech?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada bahasa adat?
db_Object: Is there ritual speech?

Feature: Does the ritual speech involve parallellisms, dual symbolic categories?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Tolong kasih contoh bahasa adat itu? Contoh: pernikahan = "jalan baru, jejak segar"
db_Object: Does the ritual speech involve parallellisms, dual symbolic categories?

Feature: Is the ritual language known by everyone (or just by traditional leaders)?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah bahasa adat itu diketahui oleh semua orang atau oleh hanya ketua adat?
db_Object: Is the ritual language known by everyone (or just by traditional leaders)?

Feature: Are there ritual songs?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada nyanyian adat? Contoh?
db_Object: Are there ritual songs?

Feature: Are there ritual dances?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada lego-lego?
db_Object: Are there ritual dances?

Feature: Is the language of the ritual songs a language you understand?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah bapak bisa mengerti kata-kata nyanyian adat atau lego-lego?
db_Object: Is the language of the ritual songs a language you understand?

Feature: Is the language of the ritual songs a foreign language?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah kata-kata di nyanyian adat sebenarnya dari bahasa orang / suku lain?
db_Object: Is the language of the ritual songs a foreign language?

Feature: Do women and men dance together?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah perempuan dan laki-laki boleh lego-lego bersama? Bagaimana caranya?
db_Object: Do women and men dance together?

Feature: Are there traditional ceremonies where men and women must be separated?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada upacara adat hanya untuk laki-laki, perempuan dilarang ikut? Ada upacara hanya untuk perempuan?
db_Object: Are there traditional ceremonies where men and women must be separated?

Feature: Is there a ceremony relating to planting/harvesting?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada upacara adat yang berkaitan dengan pertanian dan panen? Pada saat apa saja upacara adat itu dilakukan? Apa nama nama upacara-upacara adat itu? apa saja perlengkapan yang diperlukan? Bagaimana melaksanakan upacara adat?
db_Object: Is there a ceremony relating to planting/harvesting?

Feature: Did your ancestors arrive in boats?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Nenek moyang dari dulu datang dengan perahu?
db_Object: Did your ancestors arrive in boats?

Feature: Does sacrifice involve feeding of ancestors?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Pengorbanan yang diberikan itu adalah makanan untuk nenek moyang?
db_Object: Does sacrifice involve feeding of ancestors?

Feature: Is there/are  there (a) ritual place(s)?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada tempat untuk melakukan ritual adat?
db_Object: Is there/are  there (a) ritual place(s)?

Feature: Did your ancestors arrive as sea animals? (shark, crocodile, turtle, dolphin)
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah nenek moyang menurut ceritera adat merupakan ikan hiu, buaya, kura-kura, ikan lumba-lumba, atau binatang yang lain?
db_Object: Did your ancestors arrive as sea animals? (shark, crocodile, turtle, dolphin)

Feature: Is there a myth about the origin of the people?
Clarifying Comments: Record example with translation, preferably glossed.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada mitos/cerita rakyat/legenda tentang asal-usul orang di desa ini? Bagaimana ceritanya?
db_Object: Is there a myth about the origin of the people?

Feature: Are there traditional religious leaders or specialists?
Clarifying Comments: Give names/titles for these.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada pemimpin agama/ahli agama adat? Dia disebut apa?
db_Object: Are there traditional religious leaders or specialists?

Feature: Are there traditional drinks, or stimulants?
Clarifying Comments: Rice wine, sirih pinang...
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada minuman tradisional atau minuman kesehatan tradisional? Apa nama minumannya? Terbuat dari apa minuman-minuman ini?
db_Object: Are there traditional drinks, or stimulants?

Feature: Is there a traditional sacrifice place?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Adat tempat pengorbaan adat?
db_Object: Is there a traditional sacrifice place?

Feature: Are there rituals around birth?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada ritual adat saat sebelum atau sesudah melahirkan? bagaimana ritualnya/
db_Object: Are there rituals around birth?

Feature: Are there rituals around death?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada ritual adat saat kematian seseorang? Bagaimana ritualnya?
db_Object: Are there rituals around death?

Feature: Are there seasonal rituals apart from planting and harvesting, for example is there a ritual to ask for rain? Or other rituals?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada ritual adat musiman, selain ritual tentang penanaman dan pemanenan, contohnya ritual minta hujan?
db_Object: Are there seasonal rituals apart from planting and harvesting, for example is there a ritual to ask for rain? Or other rituals?

Feature: Do women traditionally weave?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ibu-ibu di sini tahu menenun? Cara menenun itu, ikut cara adat dari nenek moyang di sini, atau caranya diambil dari orang lain?
db_Object: Do women traditionally weave?

Feature: Is there traditional pottery?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada hasil kerajinan tanah liat tradisional? Apa saja hasil kerajinannya? Apakah untuk dijual atau digunakan sendiri?
db_Object: Is there traditional pottery?

Feature: Are there moko?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada moko?
db_Object: Are there moko?

Feature: Is it allowed to exchange the moko?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah moko diberikan
db_Object: Is it allowed to exchange the moko?

Feature: Are there people who make new moko?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada orang yang membuat moko baru?
db_Object: Are there people who make new moko?

Feature: Are there traditional music instruments?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada alat-alat musik tradisional?
db_Object: Are there traditional music instruments?

Feature: Are there particular traditional music styles?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada jenis/gaya musik tradisional tertentu yang dimainkan di desa ini? Apa bedanya dengan jenis/gaya musik tradisional yang dimainkan di tempat lain?
db_Object: Are there particular traditional music styles?

Feature: Do people use body paint or tattoo?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah di desa ini ada cat tubuh/tato?
db_Object: Do people use body paint or tattoo?

Feature: Were teeth traditionally filed? (i.e. made shorter with a file)
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah gigi diperpendek dengan kikir?
db_Object: Were teeth traditionally filed? (i.e. made shorter with a file)

Feature: Are there typical traditional haircuts?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah di desa ini ada gaya potongan rambut tertentu?
db_Object: Are there typical traditional haircuts?

Feature: Traditional piercings?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada lubang di telinga, hidung, bibir, atau pipi untuk memasukkan perhiasan?
db_Object: Traditional piercings?

Feature: Are feathers or beads used as adornments?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada bulu ayam atau perhiasan lain untuk membuat hiasan kepala?
db_Object: Are feathers or beads used as adornments?

Feature: Is there traditional jewelry?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah masyarakat di desa ini biasa memakai perhiasan adat? Apa saja perhiasan adat yang biasa dipakai? Bagaimana bentuknya? Terbuat dari apa perhiasan ini?
db_Object: Is there traditional jewelry?

Feature: Is there special adornment used in rituals or ceremonies?
Clarifying Comments: E.g.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah saat melakukan ritual adat atau tari-tarian adat masyarakat di desa ini memakai perhiasan? Bagaimana perhiasan-perhiasan itu dipakai? Terbuat dari apa perhiasan itu?
db_Object: Is there special adornment used in rituals or ceremonies?

Feature: Is spatial organization divided into primary and secondary type?
Clarifying Comments: AN (Fox 1997) primary spatial organisation is East West (path of the sun); secondary is upstream/downstream, landward/seaward right/left
db_Object: Is spatial organization divided into primary and secondary type?

Feature: Are there conceptual connections between spatial directions such as E+S / W + N with male/female, or with day/night, or with right/left?
db_Object: Are there conceptual connections between spatial directions such as E+S / W + N with male/female, or with day/night, or with right/left?

Feature: Do adults in this village typically speak more than one local language?
Clarifying Comments: Indonesian/Malay is not considered a local language.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah orang dewasa di desa ini biasanya bicara lebih dari satu bahasa daerah? Bahasa apa saja yang digunakan?
db_Object: Do adults in this village typically speak more than one local language?

Feature: Do children typically speak more than one local language?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah anak-anak biasanya mampu bicara lebih dari satu bahasa daerah? Bahasa apa saja yang digunakan?
db_Object: Do children typically speak more than one local language?

Feature: Is it common in this village that husband and wife have different languages?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah di desa ini sudah biasa jika suami dan istri berbicara dengan bahasa yang berbeda?
db_Object: Is it common in this village that husband and wife have different languages?

Feature: Does a wife learn to speak the language of her husband?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah seorang istri belajar untuk berbicara bahasa suaminya?
db_Object: Does a wife learn to speak the language of her husband?

Feature: Does a husband learn to speak the language of his wife?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah seorang suami belajar untuk berbicara bahasa istrinya?
db_Object: Does a husband learn to speak the language of his wife?

Feature: Do they communicate with a third language?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah suami dan istri berbicara dengan bahasa ketiga (seperti bahasa Indonesia atau bahasa daerah lingua franca, seperti Lamaholot/Tetun)
db_Object: Do they communicate with a third language?

Feature: Do people traditionally hunt?
Clarifying Comments: Percentage?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah masyarakat di sini berburu secara tradisional? Bagaimana mereka berburu? Alat apa saja yang digunakan?
db_Object: Do people traditionally hunt?

Feature: Do people traditionally fish in the sea?
Clarifying Comments: Percentage?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah masyarakat di sini mencari ikan dengan cara tradisional? Bagaimana mereka mencari ikan? Alat apa saja yang digunakan?
db_Object: Do people traditionally fish in the sea?

Feature: Do people traditionally have animal husbandry?
Clarifying Comments: Percentage?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah masyarakat di sini mempunyai hewan peliharaan? Apa saja hewan yang diternakkan? Apa saja hewan yang dirawat di rumah?
db_Object: Do people traditionally have animal husbandry?

Feature: Do people traditionally have agriculture?
Clarifying Comments: Percentage?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah masyarakat di sini mempunyai lahan pertanian? Di mana lokasi lahan mereka? Apakah di sekitar rumah atau letaknya agak jauh?
db_Object: Do people traditionally have agriculture?

Feature: Intensity of cultivation?
Clarifying Comments: 1) no agriculture 2) extensive or shifting agriculture 3) horticulture 4) intensive agriculture / irrigation
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Bagaimana dengan intensitas perawatan terhadap tenaman di ladang?
db_Object: Intensity of cultivation?

Feature: Major crops?
Clarifying Comments: 1) corn, 2) dry/wet rice, 3) tree fruits, 3) roots or tubers
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apa pertanian utama di desa ini? Apa saja hasil yang dipanen? Apa saja hasil panen yang paling banyak?
db_Object: Major crops?

Feature: Are there clans?
Clarifying Comments: Specify in notes field.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada suku di desa ini? Ada berapa suku di desa ini? Sebutkan suku-suku yang ada di desa ini! Bapak dari suku yang mana?
db_Object: Are there clans?

Feature: Are there moieties?
Clarifying Comments: Moieties are descendant/social/ritual groups into which a clan is divided. Specificy in notes field.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada marga di sini? Suku dibagi dalam marga apa saja?
db_Object: Are there moieties?

Feature: Is there a concept of 'house' (uma/rumah) that equals a descent group?
Clarifying Comments: In Alor Kecil "uma" are important for social organization.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah nama suku / marga itu terhubung dengan sebuah "rumah"? Apakah sebuah marga disebut "rumah xx"?
db_Object: Is there a concept of 'house' (uma/rumah) that equals a descent group?

Feature: Are clans matrilineal
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Nenek moyang suku adalah laki-laki atau perempuan?
db_Object: Are clans matrilineal

Feature: Are clans, subclans or lineages ranked
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Di antara suku2 / marga2 ini, ada suku yg dianggap lebih besar/penting/tinggi? Ada suku/marga yg dianggap kurang besar/penting atau yg rendah? Misalnya, keturunan dari anak satu bapak: keturunan anak yg sulung diganggap lebih  besar/tinggi daripada keturunan dari anak yg bungsu. Contoh lain: keturunan dari  orang yg asli daerah dianggap lebih penting daripada  keturunan dari pendatang atau sebaliknya. Apa suku yang dianggap paling tinggi? Apa suku yang ada di bawahnya? Apa suku yang berada di tingkatan paling bawah? Mengapa sebuah suku disebut memiliki tingkatan yang paling tinggi atau rendah?
db_Object: Are clans, subclans or lineages ranked

Feature: Does every clan speak their own language?
Clarifying Comments: I.e. are clans identified by languages?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah setiap suku berbicara dengan bahasa mereka masing-masing?
db_Object: Does every clan speak their own language?

Feature: Is real property (land) inherited?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah rumah dan tanah diwariskan?
db_Object: Is real property (land) inherited?

Feature: Did one person (lord / clan) originally own all the land?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Pada zaman dulu, siapa yang memiliki tanah/kebun di sini? Apakah ada satu orang pemilik atau satu keluarga atau satu suku? Apakah ada pemimpin atau raja yang dulu menjadi pemilik tanah di desa ini?
db_Object: Did one person (lord / clan) originally own all the land?

Feature: Are there inheritance rules?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada aturan-aturan tentang pewarisan? Apa saja aturannya?
db_Object: Are there inheritance rules?

Feature: Is land inheritance matrilineal (sister's sons; sister's younger brother)?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah pewarisan tanah/rumah bersifat mengutamakan anak perempuan?
db_Object: Is land inheritance matrilineal (sister's sons; sister's younger brother)?

Feature: Is land inheritance patrilineal (sons)?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah pewarisan tanah/rumah bersifat mengutamakan anak laki-laki?
db_Object: Is land inheritance patrilineal (sons)?

Feature: Is moveable property inheritance matrilineal (sister's sons; sister's younger brother)?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah pewarisan benda bergerak, seperti kuda, perahu, dan sepeda motor bersifat mengutamakan anak perempuan?
db_Object: Is moveable property inheritance matrilineal (sister's sons; sister's younger brother)?

Feature: Is moveable property inheritance patrilineal?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah pewarisan benda bergerak, seperti kuda, perahu, dan sepeda motor bersifat mengutamakan anak laki-laki?
db_Object: Is moveable property inheritance patrilineal?

Feature: Do all children inherit, sons and daughters alike?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah semua anak, baik laki-laki maupun perempuan, mendapatkan warisan yang sama?
db_Object: Do all children inherit, sons and daughters alike?

Feature: Do all children inherit, with daughters receiving less?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah semua anak, baik laki-laki maupun perempuan, mendapatkan warisan dengan anak perempuan menerima lebih sedikit?
db_Object: Do all children inherit, with daughters receiving less?

Feature: Can newcomers aquire land or gardens?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Orang pendatang bisa memiliki tanah atau kebun di sini? Bagaimana orang dari luar bisa menjadi pemilik tanah di desa ini?
db_Object: Can newcomers aquire land or gardens?

Feature: At what age should young people get married?
Clarifying Comments: Difference between boys and girls?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Di usia berapa seorang pemuda dan pemudi diharuskan untuk menikah? Di desa ini, pemuda paling muda menikah di usia berapa dan pemuda paling tua menikah di usia berapa? Di desa ini, pemudi paling muda menikah di usia berapa dan pemudi paling tua menikah di usia berapa?
db_Object: At what age should young people get married?

Feature: Are there marriage rules – specify in notes field
Clarifying Comments: i.e. cannot marry category X, or must/should marry Y
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Ceriteralah tentang peraturan menyankut hubungan kawin-mawin? Contoh: Ada hubungan kawin yg dianggap paling baik/cocok, dan  yg dianggap kurang  baik/tidak cocok? Ada hubungan yg dilarang sama sekali? Isterinya pindah ke sukunya suami, atau laki-laki pindah ke sukunya isteri?
db_Object: Are there marriage rules – specify in notes field

Feature: Is there gift exchange between bride's and groom's sides?
Clarifying Comments: Food, drink?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada tukar hadiah antara pengantin perempuan dan pengantin laki-laki?
db_Object: Is there gift exchange between bride's and groom's sides?

Feature: Is there bride service?
Clarifying Comments: Service rendered to the bride's family by the bridegroom as a bride-price or part of a bride-price.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada syarat-syarat tertentu yang harus dilakukan oleh pengantin laki-laki kepada pengantin perempuan? Contohnya adalah layanan yang dilakukan keluarga pengantin laki-laki kepada keluarga pengantin perempuan.
db_Object: Is there bride service?

Feature: Transfer of residence at marriage?
Clarifying Comments: 1) wife to husband's group 2) optional for couple 3) husband to wife's group
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Setelah menikah, apakah pasangan pengantin pindah rumah?
db_Object: Transfer of residence at marriage?

Feature: Marital residence with kin?
Clarifying Comments: 1) with husbands or wife's unilineal kin group 2) with wife's mother's brother group 3) with husbands or wife's parents 4) optional: with either set of parents 5) do not reside with relatives
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Setelah menikah, apakah pasangan pengantin tinggal dengan keluarga atau tinggal sendiri?
db_Object: Marital residence with kin?

Feature: Are traditional marriages obligatorily exogamous?
Clarifying Comments: Obligatory exogamy is that one MUST marry outside of ones clan.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah seorang pemuda boleh menikah dengan wanita dari satu suku dengan dirinya atau boleh menikah dengan wanita dari suku yang lain?
db_Object: Are traditional marriages obligatorily exogamous?

Feature: If mother dies, who raises the children?
Possible Values: 12:Father and his family.;10:Father and/or his family;11:Mother and/or her family
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Jika ibu meninggal dunia, siapa yang akan merawat anak? Bagaimana jika ayah menikah lagi?
db_Object: If mother dies, who raises the children?

Feature: Does a man typically marry a woman of his mother's subclan?
Clarifying Comments: A man's fathers wifegivers (= his mothers subclan) also provide his wife (asymmetric matrilateral cross-cousin).
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah para laki-laki muda (pemuda) biasanya menikahi wanita dari suku kerabat ibunya?
db_Object: Does a man typically marry a woman of his mother's subclan?

Feature: Does a woman typicaly marry a man of her father’s subclan?
Clarifying Comments: (this causes pairs or sets of clans to be more closely allied over time)
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Kalau anak perempuan menikah, harus menikah dengan laki-laki dari suku atau marga bapaknya?
db_Object: Does a woman typicaly marry a man of her father’s subclan?

Feature: Are there locality-based restrictions on marriage
Clarifying Comments: e.g. cannot marry within the village
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Ada pembatasan pernikahan terkait dengan tempat tinggal? Contoh: anak dari kampong ini tidak boleh nikah dengan anak sini.
db_Object: Are there locality-based restrictions on marriage

Feature: Was polygamy permitted
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Menurut adat, apakah laki-laki boleh menikah dengan dua atau tiga isteri?
db_Object: Was polygamy permitted

Feature: Was polyandry permitted?
Clarifying Comments: a woman marrying more than one man
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Menurut adat, apakah perempuan boleh menikah dengan dua atau tiga suami?
db_Object: Was polyandry permitted?

Feature: Is bridewealth paid by the groom's side to the bride's side
Clarifying Comments: check the local term for this, and the type of goods that are exchanged (e.g. horses, pigs, goats, money, gongs, moko, food?)
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah belis dibayar oleh pihak laki-laki kepada pihak perempuan?
db_Object: Is bridewealth paid by the groom's side to the bride's side

Feature: Is dowry paid by the bride's side to the groom's side
Clarifying Comments: check the local term for this, exchange of e.g. sarong adat, kebaya, jewelry?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah mas kawin dibayar oleh pihak perempuan kepada pihak laki-laki?
db_Object: Is dowry paid by the bride's side to the groom's side

Feature: Are villages the typical settlement pattern?
Clarifying Comments: Villages are compact and relatively permanent settlements; more homes together, typically centred on one or more open spaces.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah masyarakat di desa ini biasanya memiliki pola tempat tinggal yang berpindah-pindah atau tidak selamanya menetap di suatu tempat?
db_Object: Are villages the typical settlement pattern?

Feature: Are dispersed solitary family homesteads the typical settlement pattern?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah di desa ini ada kelompok-kelompok masyarakat yang tinggal secara terpisah (separate)  dan tidak menyatu dengan penduduk desa pada umumnya? Apakah di desa ini ada keluarga yang hidup terpisah dari penduduk desa yang menetap di desa? Ada berapa keluarga yang hidup terpisah?
db_Object: Are dispersed solitary family homesteads the typical settlement pattern?

Feature: Are settlements permanent?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah penduduk di desa ini menetap secara permanen di rumah-rumah mereka?
db_Object: Are settlements permanent?

Feature: Are villages/hamlets centered on a group of related women
Clarifying Comments: This is a result of matrilocal post-marital residence.
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah rumah-rumah warga berpusat dengan kelompok yang memiliki wanita-wanita/istri-istri yang saling berkerabat? Contohnya adalah beberapa rumah yang lokasinya saling berdekatan memiliki keluarga yang masing-masing istrinya memiliki hubungan kekerabatan keluarga yang erat.
db_Object: Are villages/hamlets centered on a group of related women

Feature: Mean size of local communities?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Jumlah penduduk lokal yang tinggal di desa ini ada berapa?
db_Object: Mean size of local communities?

Feature: Are villages/hamlets centered on a group of related men?
Clarifying Comments: Result of patrilocal post-marital residence
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah rumah-rumah warga berpusat dengan kelompok yang memiliki pria-pria/suami-suami yang saling berkerabat? Contohnya adalah beberapa rumah yang lokasinya saling berdekatan memiliki keluarga yang masing-masing suaminya memiliki hubungan kekerabatan keluarga yang erat.
db_Object: Are villages/hamlets centered on a group of related men?

Feature: Are villages/hamlets (traditionally) located on hill tops?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah desa-desa berlokasi di pegunungan?
db_Object: Are villages/hamlets (traditionally) located on hill tops?

Feature: Are villages/hamlets (tradtionally) located on the shore?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah desa-desa berlokasi di pantai?
db_Object: Are villages/hamlets (tradtionally) located on the shore?

Feature: Do villages have places or spaces for gatherings?
Clarifying Comments: 1) rectangular ground for ritual activities and public meetings 2) building for public meetings such as church or mosque 3) mound of stones functioning as sacrificial altar
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada ruang terbuka/tertutup untuk upacara adat, pertemuan, rapat, atau berkumpul para warga desa?
db_Object: Do villages have places or spaces for gatherings?

Feature: Shape of (traditional) houses?
Clarifying Comments: 1) Rectangular, square 2) (Semi) circular 3) Quadrangular around an inner court
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Bagaimana bentuk rumah adat di desa ini? Apakah Anda bisa menggambarkan bentuk rumah adat desa ini?
db_Object: Shape of (traditional) houses?

Feature: Floor level of traditional houses?
Clarifying Comments: 1) floor formed by ground 2) elevated slightly or on raised platform 3) raised substantially on piles, posts, or piers
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Bagaimana tingkatan lantai atau bentuk lantai dalam rumah adat?
db_Object: Floor level of traditional houses?

Feature: Shape of roof of traditional houses?
Clarifying Comments: 1) rounded or semi cylindrical 2) hipped or pyramidical (four slopes) 4) two slopes, 5) flat, 6) other?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Bagaimana bentuk atap rumah adat?
db_Object: Shape of roof of traditional houses?

Feature: Is there an attic or loft in a traditional house?
Clarifying Comments: If there is, what is it used for?
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Apakah ada kamar loteng di rumah adat? Apakah ada kamar di bawah lantai rumah adat, seperti di bawah rumah panggung?
db_Object: Is there an attic or loft in a traditional house?

Feature: Do leaders come from particular lineages?
Clarifying Comments: patrilineal, matrilineal
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Tentang ketua adat di sini: mereka keturunan dari satu marga atau satu keluarga?
db_Object: Do leaders come from particular lineages?

Feature: Are leaders non-hereditary?
Clarifying Comments: 1) election or formal consensus 2) wealth, social status
Feature prompt in Indonesian: Ketua adat di sini: siapa yang bisa menjadi ketua adat atau kepala?
db_Object: Are leaders non-hereditary?

Feature: Are there groups with whom traditional relations are forbidden?
